questions.explanation:
Diane.

	At the end of season 4 he is on the phone and said, "Oh what the hell, will you marry me?" When this episode starts we see Diane on the other end holding the phone.

"Billy Joe Bob Jim".

	Carla was once again making fun of Woody being from the country. Woody never gets offended at Carla's insults, in part because he's a good natured guy, but even more so because he usually doesn't get that he's being insulted.

questions.text: Did the person that Sam Malone proposed to accept the proposal?
questions.explanation:
No.

	When Sam first proposed over the phone she said she wanted him to propose more romantically. So, Sam took Diane out on a boat and proposed again. Only Diane thought he was proposing to her because he broke up with Janet, so she turned him down.

questions.text: Who started dancing in a circle upon hearing Sam's news?
questions.explanation:
Carla and Frasier.

	Carla didn't want Sam to marry Diane because she hated Diane. Frasier didn't want Sam to marry Diane because he still hoped he would one day marry her.

questions.text: Who gave Diane a neck massage?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	As he is massaging he fantasizes strangling her. Later on in this episode, he said in reference to this scene, "I should have killed her when I had the chance."

questions.text: What did Sam propose the 3rd time he proposed?
questions.correct: she step in front of a speeding bus
options: she take a long walk off a short pier
questions.explanation:
she step in front of a speeding bus.

	Diane came back to the bar telling Sam this time she would say yes to her proposal. He was still angry that she turned him down and told her to step in front of a speeding bus. However, Diane did not give up easily and continued even into future episodes of this season saying Sam would propose again to her eventually.

questions.text: Did the others think that Sam and the woman he proposed to would get back together?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Just about everyone in the bar thought that Sam and Diane were destined to be together. Sam tried hard to convince them they were wrong, but to no avail.

questions.text: What did Diane pick out of the garbage near the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
a picture of Sam.

	We don't see when she threw the picture away, but most likely it was during the time he was dating Janet. After trying to clean the picture off she says, "I'll get one later."

questions.text: Who did Cliff say the sailboat date worked great for?
questions.explanation:
Sean and Madonna.

	At some point all these people were an item. Sean Penn and Madonna were married from August 16, 1985 - September 14, 1989. Cliff had suggested this idea to Sam for his romantic date.

questions.text: What did Norm say when Sam asked if they believed he and Diane would get back together?
options: "That depends, will my answer affect my bar tab?"
questions.explanation:
"Can I have my drink first?".

	Sam said he was buying everyone a free drink to celebrate that he and Diane were done. But when Diane said no one would believe that, Norm didn't want to risk losing his free beer.
